name: mushroom skin (tanned)
description: We applied chemical treatment to leather-like fibers so that they could be used as materials. By using it, the skin can be expanded and used for other purposes.

use_action.msg: I've made up my mind to feel good. This would work just like animal leather.
use_action.not_ready_msg: The skin is not finished yet.

name: minamata
description: It is the wisdom of the old-fashioned life that uses Minamata as a remedy. The microbes in the blisters promote treatment.

name: mycena chlorophos lamp (on)
description: Among the light-emitting mushrooms, the brightness of Yakutake is particularly great. Furthermore, this Yakutake is mutated, and illuminates a very wide area.

use_action.msg: I concealed the light emission part and made it not light.

name: mycena chlorophos lamp (off)
description: A cover is put on this Yakutake, and it is made not to shine. Remove to brighten.

use_action.msg: I removed the cover and let the surrounding lights shine.

name: tukiyotake lamp (on)
description: Tukiyotake is widely distributed in Far East Russia and northeastern China, centering on Japan. It is a kind of mushroom that belongs to the genus Tsukiyotake of the genus Haratake eyes. It is light-emitting though weak.

use_action.msg: I concealed the light emission part and made it not light.

name: tukiyotake lamp (off)
description: This Tsukiyotake is covered and covered so it does not glow. Remove to brighten.

use_action.msg: I removed the cover and let the surrounding lights shine.
